SELECT id, merchant_name, STATUS, dealer_id, create_time, (select d.proxy_name from tb_dealer as d where d.id=dealer_id) as proxy_name FROM tb_merchant_info WHERE merchant_name=#{merchantName} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT ${pageNo},${pageSize}
